Scourge nodded slowly as his optics glowed dangerously. "An Autobot
tryi=
ng to sneak into the very den of the Predacons, and he hoped to
survive?" h=
e said in one of his longer phrases. "You are prey, prey
that will be termi=
nated." Scourge chuckled quietly as he approached to
take Nightshift into c=
ustody. Scourge typically did not carry stasis
cuff, however his stunner be=
ams were every bit as effective to pick
off stragglers that the upper echel=
on did not want slain immediately.
With an elegantly simple move he oriente=
d them on Nightshift and
fired.

Scorponok smiled as he stepped over toward=

just entered, in an obvious attempt to cut off=
 any escape by
Nightshift, Scorponok's shoulder cannons coming online as th=
ey
prepared to fire should Nightshift try to flee. "You know, you still
rem=
ind me of another bot." Scorponok said as he examined Nightshift,
"Perhaps =
as we disassemble you we will see who it is." Scorponok

 grin appearing on his malevolent face.
